name: Shaun Sauna And The Steamy Robots
name_original: Shaun Sauna And The Steamy Robots
description:
Waves of robots attack kill them and protect your sauna in the middle of the square

Killing a robot earns the player money that he can use to purchase upgrades in the weapons shop. 

Two bars are shown in the corner, the bullet-time bar and the special fire bar. The red health icon is the sauna and the green icon is the player. 

Ammo boxes and sauna health boxes spawn in the street surrounding the main square that can be picked up using the 'e' key

Known bug: the special fire of the pistol only damages the red melee robots
